title: E2E Test Setup
implementationNotes: Playwright installed with Chromium. Created playwright.config.ts for Vite dev server. E2E test structure with helpers.ts created. 12 app launch tests in app.spec.ts. Tests require selector/timing adjustments for app initialization.
impact: Establishes E2E testing infrastructure for Tauri app

tasks.title: Install Playwright and Tauri driver
tasks.description: Install Playwright and @playwright/test for E2E testing.
tasks.implementationNotes: Installed @playwright/test v1.57.0 via pnpm. Installed Chromium browser via npx playwright install chromium.

tasks.title: Create playwright.config.ts
tasks.description: Create Playwright configuration for Tauri E2E testing.
tasks.implementationNotes: Created playwright.config.ts with Vite dev server (port 5173), Chromium project, screenshot on failure, trace on first retry.

tasks.title: Create E2E test directory structure
tasks.description: Create the test/e2e/ directory with helper utilities.
tasks.implementationNotes: Created test/e2e/ directory with helpers.ts containing waitForAppReady, getEditorContent, setEditorContent, selectors object, and menu helper functions.

tasks.title: Create app.spec.ts
tasks.description: Test basic app launch and UI with 6 test cases.
tasks.implementationNotes: Created 12 tests (exceeds planned 6): 6 App Launch tests + 6 Toolbar Buttons tests covering all major UI elements.

tasks.title: Add E2E scripts to package.json
tasks.description: Add npm scripts for running E2E tests.
tasks.implementationNotes: Added three scripts: test:e2e (playwright test), test:e2e:headed (--headed), test:e2e:debug (--debug).

notes: E2E tests require Vite dev server running
Tests timeout waiting for app initialization - need selector/timing adjustments
E2E tests excluded from CI workflow
